name: Joining The Council
description:
This is a short, weird, experimental, first-person walking simulator where you play as an Alien joining an Alien council known as 'The Council'.

You have rose through the ranks and are now ready to do whatever more there needs to do to join The Council.

Also, be sure to follow me on Twitter for any new updates in relation to my games and other stuff: https://twitter.com/omogonix
